name: IDN-Subs-Count-UserBot
description: Subscriber Count on Channel or Member Count on Group

APP_ID.description: Your API_ID, Get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Your API_HASH, Get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

CHANNELS.description: List of channel/group usernames, seperated by space.

COUNTS_EDIT_CHANNEL.description: Username of channel/group to edit the subscriber count.

SLEEP_TIME.description: Sleep time for bot before re-check the subs count, default to 10 seconds.
